string.text: Enables the mod logic. The dialogue option will be removed when disabled. Default is Enabled.
Enable Relation Loss With Own Faction Leader
Enables relation loss with your faction leader. Default is Disabled.
Relation Loss With Own Faction Leader
The amount of relation loss with your faction leader. Default is -10.
Enable Relation Loss With Own Faction Clans
Enables relation loss with your faction's clans. Default is Disabled.
Relation Loss With Own Faction Clans
The amount of relation loss with your faction's clans. Default is -10.
Enables an exception to relation loss for own faction clans whose leader has an honor level at or below the selected value. Default is Disabled.
A clan leader in your faction at or below the selected value will not have a lower opinion of you for provoking a war against another faction's vassals. Default is -1.
Relation Loss With Enemy Faction Leader
The amount of relation loss with the enemy faction leader. Default is -10.
Relation Loss With Enemy Target Clan
The amount of relation loss with the enemy target clan. Default is -10.
